original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁āsav avippayutt aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na āsav asampayutt o ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁āsav asampayutt aṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na āsav asampayutt o ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁āsav avippayutt aṃ ▁abyākat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁na āsav asampayutt o ▁na a byākat o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
